title: New: Milo M – Suburbia
content:
Banjos ruin 99% of songs; that’s a factually correct statistic.

Thankfully for us and for Milo M, the gentle strumming of the banjo perfectly compliments his pensive vocals on his debut track Suburbia. Downcast and enchantingly moody, there’s hints of Dylan, amidst touches of Kim Janssen and The Tallest Man On Earth, yet adopting a more mystical atmosphere. Check out Suburbia below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
